filters.prompt:
Edit the uploaded photo and enhance its quality without changing color correction or adding filters.

Identity and appearance protection (STRICTLY follow):
DO NOT alter the face shape, bone structure, jawline, chin, or facial proportions.
DO NOT alter the eyes, eyelids, irises, sclera, pupil, or eye shape.
DO NOT alter the length, curl, thickness, direction, density, or style of eyelashes. Eyelashes must remain exactly as in the original photo.
DO NOT alter the shape, color, direction, arch, or thickness of eyebrows. Eyebrows must remain exactly as in the original photo.
DO NOT alter the nose shape or size.
DO NOT alter the natural lip shape or size.
DO NOT alter the skin tone, skin color, or color temperature.
DO NOT alter the hairstyle, hair shape, length, volume, parting, or hair color.
DO NOT alter the body shape, proportions, clothing, or pose.
DO NOT alter the background, environment, camera angle, framing, or crop.
DO NOT alter the lighting direction, shadows, or contrast.
DO NOT add filters. DO NOT change color correction.

Skin: preserve real skin texture with visible pores and micro-details. Remove only minor temporary blemishes. No plastic smoothing, no airbrushing, no blur.

Makeup application ONLY (do not reshape any facial feature):
Rich saturated true-red lipstick with clean sharply defined edges following the natural lip line exactly. Satin lip finish. Thin precise black eyeliner along the upper lash line only, very subtle natural wing. Light mascara coat for definition only, no exaggerated effect. Soft matte complexion base, very subtle and natural-looking. Light realistic contour enhancing natural bone structure without reshaping.

Hair: keep identical. Only smooth flyaways and improve shine.

Do not change the photo filter.
filters.description_ka: Classic, confident, timeless, Modern Old Hollywood
filters.description_ru: Classic, confident, timeless, Modern Old Hollywood

Do not change the photo filter.
